So long, Paperight

The Paperight service closed at the end of March 2015. The legacy lives on, so we’re glad you visited.

Looking for background?

The inside story: plans and lessons learned.

The code: we built an open-source printing marketplace. If you’re a developer, build your own Paperight service.

The blog: our news from launch to closure.

The founder’s blog: Arthur Attwell on the Paperight journey.

The Shuttleworth Foundation on funding Paperight.

Looking for our team?

Track us down at Electric Book Works, where Paperight began and ended.

Looking for past exam papers?

Paperight provided a valuable collection of South African Grade 12 exam papers from 2008 to 2012. You’ll find them on Dropbox here.
